title: The Mystic Mirror: Erotic Fairy Tale Romance
description: Every time a mist would appear in an antique mirror newly purchased by Silver, she would see herself in the past. And it wasn't only her but a man she knew at present as Colton, but her image's handsome lover in the other side! What could they be telling them? Since after she'd told Colton about her weird antique mirror, the couple started showing them how passionately in love they were with each other.And it was a really, passionate, show...As if they were telling them that they continue where things were left off. Again... Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: HOW PLEASUREFUL DO YOU LIKE YOUR STORIES? This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable, including sex and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
